page.title: 09Primary School Work - 1985.
page.content:
Our day begins at 9 am. We have 15 minutes playtime at 10.30 am. then we finish for lunch at 12.20 pm. We start afternoon school at 1.20 pm, have a playtime at 2.15 pm until 2.30 pm, then school finishes at 3.30 pm.
We do English, Maths, Science, Topic Work and Religious Education. We also do games, such as football, netball, cricket, rounders and gymnastics.
We have our after school activities like craft club, gym club, country dancing, drama and chess club.
The school also runs teams for football, netball, chess and rounders.
